Keywords: Fantastic Four
Real Name: Bentley Wittman
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Sidekick
SECRET DREAMS OF BEING A SUPER-VILLAIN: Leadership. When Bentley 23 uses it and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, he may remove an action token from all adjacent Sidekicks. When he uses it and the result is a 1, remove an action token from an opposing character (of your choice).

Comments
February 24, 2021
Jarosa
If you really need leadership on a Fantastic Four themed team he is cheapest option up to the set. Plus he has added bonus of group token removal. Actions are important and I have looked for the cheapest way to get extra leadership. His mastermind will help keeping your action pool too. If you are playing a sidekick based team leadership will be important especially in 300 point games. So at 1st glance he looks useless when building and looking for options to advance action total he shines at 20 points.

I don't see why you should play him unless you desperately need a low point leadership or you bring a super sidekick heavy team
February 11, 2021
Goop
Mastermind is pretty worthless here, but the main intention is to remove action tokens from sidekicks. I'm not exactly sure if all sidekicks are going to be grouped up to take advantage of this though. However if they are and you are working the Robot Thing engine, he could be quite good.
